plugin-data.name: Remote Content
plugin-data.description:
With this plugin you can have the content of the your site on Github and in-sync with your site.
Read more about this plugin on Remote Content.

complete-url-of-the-zip-file: Complete URL of the zip file.
if-you-want-to-keep-the-content-generate: If you want to keep the content generate via the user interface enable this field.
